I see things and just being able to

but I think ultimately photography helps

like I wanted everything like I wanted
to be the best producer or the best
pianist or the best photographer and I
just don't anymore I feel like I don't
focus on the results anymore I focus on
the process and I focus on myself and I
have to stress and worry and push myself

order to make art I just have to look
after myself and the art gets made just
need to take your energy into worrying
about whether you are successful or not
or what success is and put it into
making good pieces of art and not think
about it any more than that yeah you can
just go crazy into a project and then
come out the other end with a really
good piece of work
but you won't be able to do that very
many times and maybe that's what you
